question: The Nasik Conspiracy Case was registered against whom?
explanation: Nasik Conspiracy Case (1909): On December 21, 1909, Anant Laxman Kanhere (one of the member of Abhinav Bharat Society) shot the Collector of Nashik , A M T Jackson in the theartre at Nasik. This sensational murder is known as Nasik Conspiracy Case. The members of the Abhinav Bharat Society viz. V.D. Savarkar, Ganesh Savarkar, etc. were convicted and punished.
